page.title: 09WORTH SCHOOL
page.content: In Worth school there are{440}boys, {110}in the{Junior House}aged 10-13 and {330}in the{Senior House}aged 13-18.The senior school is divided into 5 houses{Butler,Chapman,Gervase,St.Bedes and{Rutherford.}They can attend upto 7 masses a week but they have to go on Sundays. They are accepted into the senior school at 13-14 on the result of an entrance exam. Fees for Autumn term are{Â£1,575}for senior school and Â£1,285 for Junior school. They have many outdoor activities e.g. Rugby, Golf, Cricket,Athletics,Tennis and Football. Indoor activities are Modelling, Chess, Cards, Computering, Carpentry, Billiards, Art, Judo and Gym. The school is run by Monks and they teach all subjects. Music is one of their strongest arts. They have special practice rooms to play their insruments.
